Class MathHelpers

    Contains helper methods that do some common mathematical calculations.

      • normalizeAngle_180

        public static float normalizeAngle_180(float angle)
        Normalize an angle around 180 degrees so that this value doesn't become too large/small.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle to normalize.
        Returns:
        The normalized angle.

      • factorToBursts

        public static int factorToBursts(double value,
                                 int timing)
        Convert a double to a natural number taking into account a circular time counter that is able to offset factor values if required. It in fact converts a factor to bursts of natural numbers. For example: value = 0,5; timing = 0 to 1 value = 0,5; timing = 1 to 0 value = 0,5; timing = 2 to 1 ...
        Parameters:
        value - The input value.
        timing - The timing value, should increment each time this is called for good results.
        Returns:
        The bursted value.
